com.epam.training.logic

Class IssueLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.training.logic.IssueLogic

  • public class IssueLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Class IssueLogic contains various methods that use DAO layer to retrieve information about the Issue(s) from a database, add or update Issue data, etc. These methods will be further used by Command layer.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vasili Andreev

      Constructs IssueLogic object.
